name: Jeremy Zhang
short_description: Jeremy Zhang is currently associated with Ramp and has an educational background from Harvard University. He has built a network of over 500 connections and has 1,000 followers on LinkedIn.
long_description: Jeremy Zhang is a professional currently affiliated with Ramp, a financial technology company that provides corporate cards and expense management software. He has an educational background from Harvard University, one of the most prestigious educational institutions in the world. Jeremy has established a significant professional network on LinkedIn with over 500 connections and has attracted 1,000 followers, indicating his professional influence. His LinkedIn profile features a custom background cover image, suggesting attention to his professional brand. While specific details about his role at Ramp, previous work experience, and educational specifics are not provided in the available data, his association with both a leading fintech company and an Ivy League institution suggests a strong professional background in business, finance, or technology.
